birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省苏州市
birth_place.en: Suzhou, Jiangsu, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任山东省省长、杭州市委书记等职。现任中共上海市委副书记，上海市人民政府市长、党组书记。
description.en: A political figure in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He has served as Governor of Shandong and Secretary of the CPC Hangzhou Municipal Committee. He is currently the Deputy Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee and Mayor of the Shanghai Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 上海市的最高地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任上海市委书记、浙江省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Party Secretary of Shanghai and Governor of Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任上海市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，龚正的前任上海市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Gong Zheng as Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 山东省的最高地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ of Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山东省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Party Secretary of Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，龚正的前任山东省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Gong Zheng as Governor of Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，龚正的继任山东省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor of Gong Zheng as Governor of Shandong.

nodes.id: 中国共产党杭州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党杭州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在杭州市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Hangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾在龚正担任杭州市委书记期间任副书记兼市长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Deputy Secretary and Mayor of Hangzhou while Gong Zheng was the municipal Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，龚正的前任杭州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Gong Zheng as Party Secretary of Hangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，龚正的继任杭州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor of Gong Zheng as Party Secretary of Hangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的最高地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest local state administrative organ of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任浙江省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Governor of Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任浙江省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Governor of Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 龚正的妻子，曾任海关总署关税征管司副巡视员。刘植岩之女，刘鹤同父异母的妹妹。
description.en: Gong Zheng's wife, who served as Deputy Inspector of the Tariff Department of the General Administration of Customs. She was the daughter of Liu Zhiyan and the half-sister of Liu He.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: University of International Business and Economics

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所财经类大学。
description.en: A university of finance and economics located in Beijing, China.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的干部培训学校。
description.en: A school for training officials directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国福建省厦门市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Xiamen, Fujian, China.

en: 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2017年至2022年间的最高权力机关。
description.en: The highest organ of authority of the Communist Party of China between 2017 and 2022.

en: 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2022年至今的最高权力机关。
description.en: The highest organ of authority of the Communist Party of China from 2022 to the present.

zh-cn: 中国共产党山东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shandong Province.

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省省会。
description.en: The capital of Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党上海市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的主管海关事务的正部级直属机构。
description.en: A ministry-level agency directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China that manages customs affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任海关总署署长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Director of the General Administration of Customs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海关总署设在天津的直属海关。
description.en: A directly subordinate customs office of the General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China located in Tianjin.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人大代表

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人大代表
en: Deputy to the 13th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十三届全国人民代表大会的成员身份。
description.en: Membership status for the 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国台湾政治人物，时任台北市市长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, then-Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央西南局组织部部长、书记处书记，是刘茶和刘鹤的父亲。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Director of the Organization Department and Secretary of the Secretariat of the Southwest Bureau of the CPC Central Committee. He was the father of Liu Cha and Liu He.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第十九届中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理。刘植岩之子，刘茶同父异母的兄长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a member of the 19th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council. He is the son of Liu Zhiyan and the half-brother of Liu Cha.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的常设领导机构。
description.en: The permanent leadership body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副总理职位。
description.en: The position of Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 龚正担任上海市市长期间，李强担任中共上海市委书记。
description.en: While Gong Zheng served as Mayor of Shanghai, Li Qiang was the Party Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Committee.

description.zh-cn: 龚正担任上海市市长期间，陈吉宁担任中共上海市委书记。
description.en: While Gong Zheng serves as Mayor of Shanghai, Chen Jining is the Party Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Committee.

description.zh-cn: 龚正接替应勇出任中共上海市委副书记，后任上海市市长。
description.en: Gong Zheng succeeded Ying Yong as Deputy Party Secretary of Shanghai and later as Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 龚正担任山东省省长期间，刘家义担任中共山东省委书记。
description.en: While Gong Zheng served as Governor of Shandong, Liu Jia'yi was the Party Secretary of the CPC Shandong Committee.

description.zh-cn: 龚正接替郭树清出任山东省省长。
description.en: Gong Zheng succeeded Guo Shuqing as Governor of Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 龚正卸任山东省省长后，由李干杰接任。
description.en: After Gong Zheng stepped down as Governor of Shandong, Li Ganjie took over the position.

relationships.target: 中国共产党杭州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 在龚正担任杭州市委书记期间，张鸿铭任其副手。
description.en: While Gong Zheng was Party Secretary of Hangzhou, Zhang Hongming served as his deputy.

description.zh-cn: 龚正接替黄坤明出任杭州市委书记。
description.en: Gong Zheng succeeded Huang Kunming as Party Secretary of Hangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 龚正卸任杭州市委书记后，由赵一德接任。
description.en: After Gong Zheng stepped down as Party Secretary of Hangzhou, Zhao Yide took over the position.

description.zh-cn: 龚正担任浙江省副省长期间，吕祖善为省长。
description.en: While Gong Zheng was Vice Governor of Zhejiang, Lü Zushan was the Governor.

description.zh-cn: 龚正担任浙江省副省长期间，夏宝龙为省长。
description.en: While Gong Zheng was Vice Governor of Zhejiang, Xia Baolong was the Governor.

description.zh-cn: 龚正担任浙江省副省长期间，李强为省长。
description.en: While Gong Zheng was Vice Governor of Zhejiang, Li Qiang was the Governor.

degree.zh-cn: 海关管理专业学士、工商管理硕士
degree.en: Bachelor in Customs Management, Master of Business Administration

description.zh-cn: 1978年至1982年就读海关管理专业，1994年至1997年就读工商管理专业在职硕士。
description.en: Studied Customs Management from 1978 to 1982, and pursued an on-the-job MBA from 1994 to 1997.

description.zh-cn: 在职攻读财政学专业博士学位。
description.en: Pursued a doctorate in Finance as an on-the-job student.

description.zh-cn: 参加一年制中青年干部培训班学习。
description.en: Attended the one-year training program for young and middle-aged cadres.

position.en: Cadre, Deputy Division Chief, Secretary, Deputy Director-General, Director-General, Deputy Commissioner

position.zh-cn: 海关总署署长办公室秘书
position.en: Secretary to the Director's Office, General Administration of Customs

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人大代表

description.zh-cn: 在上海举行的台北上海双城论坛上会面并握手。
description.en: Met and shook hands at the Taipei-Shanghai City Forum held in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 刘茶是刘鹤同父异母的妹妹。
description.en: Liu Cha is Liu He's half-sister.
